data.title: General/Other - Kano - I can't be the only one that see's this, but Kano looks heavily modeled after Trevor Goddard.
data.meta_description: No pics to post, but you can see him clear as day in the new Quan Chi trailer.  He looks so much like him and I think it's absolutely awesome.  He was...
data.text:
#1

No pics to post, but you can see him clear as day in the new Quan Chi trailer. He looks so much like him and I think it's absolutely awesome. He was always the coolest looking Kano and this just pays so much homage to him.

R.I.P Trevor Goddard.

Spinky

Neutral Skipper

#2

Kano is Trevor Goddard. He wasn't Australian until after the movie came out, either.

THTB

Arez | Booya | Riu48 - Rest Easy, Friends

#3

They've been modeling Kano after Trevor Goddard since the first movie.

#4

They've been modeling Kano after Trevor Goddard since the first movie.

Never quite nailed it until now honestly.

Mikemetroid

Who hired this guy, WTF?

#5

Kano is Trevor Goddard. He wasn't Australian until after the movie came out, either.

They've been modeling Kano after Trevor Goddard since the first movie.

Seriously the guy is literally the fundamental base for Kano, I'm pretty sure Ed Boon has confirmed this.

THTB

Arez | Booya | Riu48 - Rest Easy, Friends

#6

Never quite nailed it until now honestly.

Yeah, MK9 Kano was the closest so far. But MKX Kano is pretty much spot-on to Trevor.

Pretty awesome to see, in all honesty. Trevor made Kano amazingly fun in the movie.

#7

Yeah, MK9 Kano was the closest so far. But MKX Kano is pretty much spot-on to Trevor.

Pretty awesome to see, in all honesty. Trevor made Kano amazingly fun in the movie.

There was never a more perfect actor for the role. It really sucks that he died.

Levaranoia

War God

#8

Wow...a thread was really made about something that has been universally known for years...

#9

Wow...a thread was really made about something that has been universally known for years...

He never actually looked just like him until now.

CrimsonShadow

Administrator and Community Engineer

#10

Everyone in this thread is banned unless people post some pictures

trufenix

bye felicia

technically, he was trevor goddard in vsDC first, but nobody here likes to acknowledge that game happened.

He was made after captain Picard in mk3

#16

Levaranoia, come on. The guy obviously was making a positive post about Trevor Goddard. This is a Mortal Kombat forum. This post is welcomed.

RIP Trevor Goddard.

IMakeItL00kC00L

#17

technically, he was trevor goddard in vsDC first, but nobody here likes to acknowledge that game happened.

MKvsDCU never happened, it was just an elaborate 3 year tease/troll by ed boon

He looked just like Trevor in MK8 and MK9.

#24

MK9 Kano is my favorite look.

MKX Kano looks good too, not as much though.

Wish there was a bald alt.

Trevor made him proper in the movie. I use the lines in real life I don't give a fuck! "RIGHT ON TIME!"

I thought Kano was a BRITISH orphan from JAPAN (or was it China?).
